mapper.sql: FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.id JOIN `user` buyer ON o.buyer_id = buyer.id JOIN `user` seller ON o.seller_id = seller.id LEFT JOIN meetup_location ml ON o.meetup_location_id = ml.id LEFT JOIN user_addresses ua ON o.shipping_address_id = ua.id
mapper.select:
SELECT o.*, p.title as product_title, p.cover_image, seller.nickname as seller_nickname, ml.name as location_name, ua.recipient_name, ua.phone, CONCAT(ua.province, ' ', ua.city, ' ', ua.district, ' ', ua.detailed_address) as full_address
WHERE o.buyer_id = #{buyerId} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC

SELECT o.*, p.title as product_title, p.cover_image, buyer.nickname as buyer_nickname, ml.name as location_name, ua.recipient_name, ua.phone, CONCAT(ua.province, ' ', ua.city, ' ', ua.district, ' ', ua.detailed_address) as full_address
WHERE o.seller_id = #{sellerId} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(product_id, buyer_id, seller_id, order_status, total_price, delivery_method, meetup_location_id, meetup_time_slot, shipping_address_id) VALUES(#{productId}, #{buyerId}, #{sellerId}, #{orderStatus}, #{totalPrice}, #{deliveryMethod}, #{meetupLocationId}, #{meetupTimeSlot}, #{shippingAddressId})
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET order_status = #{status} WHERE id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE order_status = #{status}
